contents.text: Welcome to Imperva, your trusted partner in protecting your data and applications on-premises and in the cloud.
For on-premises data and application security solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for on-premises solutions.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and schedule a demo for an on-premises application security solution.
I’d like a quote to install your data security system on my own servers and check if I qualify for a veteran discount.
Discuss licensing options and deployment architecture for an on-premises data security appliance
I’d like to speak with someone about buying an on-premises data protection system; I’m not very tech-savvy and need guidance.
I need pricing and performance details for an on-premises data security appliance for my research lab.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for cloud services.

navigationGoals: Request pricing and trial details for a cloud-based security service.
I need details on your cloud security service and want to see if there’s a special rate for veterans.
Get pricing details and integration guidance for a cloud-native application security solution
I need to ask about cloud security plans and get pricing details.
I need a quote for a cloud-based web application firewall for my student project.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and resolve a technical issue with my security console.
I’m unable to access my security event logs and need technical assistance to retrieve them.
Troubleshoot a misconfiguration in my web application firewall policy causing false positives
I’m having trouble with my security software and need technical help.
I’m encountering errors installing the Imperva agent on my local server and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing and account assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: Obtain my latest invoice and update my billing information.
I have a question about my latest invoice and want to apply my veteran billing credit.
Obtain my latest invoice and update payment information for my security service subscription
I need assistance understanding a charge on my bill and updating my payment information.
I need help understanding the charges on my latest billing statement.
